title: AIIMS Rajkot Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Senior Program Coordinator and Other Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Rajkot (AIIMS Rajkot) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Senior Program Coordinators and Technical Officers Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Ph.D, Post Graduation, and MBA can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Rajkot Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested c...
